basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: The International Man of Mystery Scholarship is open to declared College of Business majors with a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA and a minimum of 12 hours remaining before degree completion. Students must have plans to study abroad for at least one semester; scholarship recipient's study abroad enrollment status will be confirmed before funds are disbursed. Eligibility Requirements Declared College of Business majors Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Minimum of 12 HRS remaining before degree completion Plans to study abroad for at least one semester Award Requirements Scholarship recipient's study abroad enrollment status will be confirmed before funds are disbursed

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
